thread.title: Europe’s Banks Yard Sale Gathering Pace
thread.title_full: Europe’s Banks Yard Sale Gathering Pace - WSJ

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Europe’s Banks Yard Sale Gathering Pace
text:
Out with the old, in with the new. A good clear-out for banks should help free up capital and balance sheet space for new lending to boost economic activity.
So, it is a good sign that banks across Europe have been selling more and more loans that are either bad, or just less attractive to own. While some countries look to have benefited from this, others have seen credit conditions improve even without many bad loans being offloaded.... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
